application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed details are of poor and unsatisfactory design, and would lead to a visually unsympathetic, contrived and obtrusive form of development that would erode the character of the original dwellinghouse and disrupt the harmony and architectural appearance of the subject dwellinghouse and the adjacent in the surrounding area, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwellinghouse and the established and prevailing pattern of development in the locality, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3. D (11) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to condition 2.4 (details of eaves) attached to planning permission P/1261/20 allowed on appeal reference APP/M5450/D/20/3261771 dated 3/3/2021 for Conversion of garage into habitable room with alterations to front elevation; Single and two storey rear extension; Hard and soft landscaping at rear including the widening of retaining wall and addition of steps (Demolition of conservatory at rear)
